data.quote: Life is not about finding yourself. Its about creating yourself.
data.author: George Bernard Shaw

data.quote: “If you only do what you can do, you will never be more than who you are.”
data.author: Master Shifu, Kung Fu Panda

data.quote: Blood Sweat and Respect. The first two you give, the last one you Earn!
data.author: Dwayne Johnson

data.quote: Your mind is like this water, my friend. When it is agitated, it becomes difficult to see. But if you allow it to settle, the answer becomes clear
data.author: Master Oogway, Kung Fu Panda

data.quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
data.author: Walt Disney

data.quote: To make something special you just have to believe it’s special.
data.author: Mr Ping., Kung Fu Panda
